name: Fastlane 3D: Street Fighter
description:
Fastlane 3D uses high-definition picture quality to create an immersive experience for players. Players can become righteous racing drivers, drive top sports cars to complete various challenges, experience speed and passion, and fight crime at the same time.
You can expand your garage, upgrade cars and unlock sub-weapons of very different styles through earning gold coins. Fight against evil force one by one while racing and experience the pleasure of both fame and money on your fingertips!

Game features.
1.The game is full of fun with ultra high definition picture and realistic style of the racing model.
2. The dazzling cool racing car shows a beautiful arc line on the racing track and blinding everyone.
3.Challenge your speed limit and show out your perfect driving skills.
4. Not afraid of power and fight against the evil forces to the end.

Highlights of the game.
1. The bustling street view, the super melodic music rhythm and the super real engine sound.
2.Continues to speed up.
3.High-definition 3D realistic painting presentation.
